message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. I know it would be a valuable asset to your business.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,450,000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position on the budget. I've tried to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $1,400,000? This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to keep my investment within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,380,000 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.
